website_summaries.verdict: A premium fish and game cleaning table that is easy to set up just about anywhere.
pros: Includes a quick-connect stainless steel faucet that can be attached to a garden hose and disconnected for storage
Provides a tapered channel for seamless water drainage
cons: May need to turn off the water supply after each use

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for the beach house!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something inexpensive for the beach house that didn’t rust and this was a great price and perfect for our needs. We only used the top and made a custom frame for it!
customer_reviews.author: JP’s Homebrew

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy table! We took this table camping and used ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy table! We took this table camping and used it for food prep, hand washing and dishwashing station. Our site didnt have any water hookups but a few items from the hardware store helped get this sink running. We hooked up a water jug to a foot pump for hands-free cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: kcu2407

customer_reviews.title: Save your back and some time.
customer_reviews.text: Something smells fishy and it's probably this table, but not because it's a bad product, rather because I use it every time I'm camping. After years of low cleaning tables that left my back aching I decided to splurge a bit and try this table. Height is great, sink hooks up to camper and works well, cleans up quick. My only suggestion is having the inner surface and inch taller than the border surface so laying a knife flat when cutting a fillet is a bit easier. That one micro kept it from being a 5 star but just barely. Great utility product that saves your back and time in line at the cleaning station.
customer_reviews.author: Inclined to Comment

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with the quality of this table. Drain installation was a breeze as long as you read other people's reviews about how to do it. Only the metal part and the rubber gasket above the table and then the plastic part goes in the bottom and then the screw goes down from the top. Thanks also to the other reviewer who showed the picture of their wooden table. I am using this as an outdoor grill prep table and it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our last camping trip. The sites where we stay have water valves. You just hook up a hose (not included) to the sink and it works. No leaks after having it hooked up for 5 days. Just keep a big bucket under it to collect the water and empty it out when it's full. The table is a good height for preparing food. The sink isn't that deep but it's big enough. Only takes a few minutes to put together with a flat head screw driver.
customer_reviews.author: Dom M

customer_reviews.title: Drain installation.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased table from warehouse deals and arrived as described. Half price of Bass Pro. I read the negative reviews on the drain and I also tried to hook it up wrong by putting plastic piece with drain screen attached through top of drain. It was obvious the hole was too small. You put the metal drain with rubber washer in sink. Put the other rubber washer on top of plastic connector and put nut in Bottom screw plastic connector on and then put long screw through top of drain and tighten. Love the height. The construction quality and hope to clean many fish.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Also started rusting pretty bad after first day out in rain (orange water ...
customer_reviews.text: Drain sent with table was not designed to fit in table. There's no way the drain will fit in hole without taking a bandsaw to table, so I've just been using it with a big hole where the drain should be so it won't hold water. Also started rusting pretty bad after first day out in rain (orange water everywhere). The rust isn't that big of a deal as long as it keeps standing, the drain being wrong was a bummer though.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Does just as advertised, I do suggest putting a splitter at the faucet intake in the case you need a second water hose for cleaning game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay Sinky
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Fast easy setup, affordable Cons: durability, build quality If you don't have time and need fast easy setup for outdoor sink then this is the item. If you plan on using this as a permanent solution for outdoors or backyard set up then build it yourself. The plumbing pieces and faucets are made of cheap material which should be upgraded with homedepot or lowes components. If you're using it once a year that might be fine but the durability won't last. The faucet and drain plastic parts must be upgraded otherwise it will leak. Make sure to use teflon tape for durability and leak prevention
customer_reviews.author: D.Snake

customer_reviews.title: Faucet is NOT stainless steel, but still keeping the table
customer_reviews.text: The table appears to be well built and I like the faucet placement in the corner. HOWEVER, as another reviewer also pointed out, faucet is NOT stainless steel. I don't even think it's metal. I am using this outside as a potting/garden station, but the table will not be that well protected from weather. I'm hoping that as long as I cover it, that the faucet will last a while. For the price, I'm still keeping this table.
customer_reviews.author: discofan

customer_reviews.title: Useful table but the drain hose is too short.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic Flexible Retractable Water Drain Pipe Hose actually broke. Very thin and no durable at all, have to purchase another hose prob from home depot. Aside from that the table pretty stable and the faucet works good. The placement of the faucet connector isn't at it's most convenient spot, if it was a little more away from the corner it'll be a much easier install since i use and store the same day. Connecting and disconnecting the hose to the faucet isn't a smooth operation although it's somewhat tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Easypeasy88

customer_reviews.title: Better than you'd think!
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't think for less than a hundred dollars delivered this would be worth using.. But, it absolutely is and it works great! It's good and steady, holds a lot of fish, plenty of room to fillet your fish and the sink hooks right up to your garden hose end. We plug the sink with the included stopper and put the cleaned fish fillets in water while cleaning the rest of the fish. The surface material is very solid and hard, but strangely its not "too hard" either. It's really a nice table, especially for under a hundred bucks. Buy it no need to hesitate on it.. It's what you want if cleaning fish or game. Easy 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Capt. RL

customer_reviews.title: Great portable fishing table and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift and it was even better that I was hoping for. It's got a tall base which works for us as taller people (6'+). The table itself is extremely sturdy and having the sink with faucet is a great addition. The only thing I could suggest to modify or make the table better would be to add a sprayer nozzle that could be used either with or instead of the faucet feature.
customer_reviews.author: erinshel

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I have been using this everyday since ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have been using this everyday since receiving it. I do a lot of backyard grilling and this table is so convenient for prep work and washing up. It sure beats running back in forth into the house! The table is solid and the faucet works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Grill Guy

customer_reviews.title: Right on time
customer_reviews.text: I am a semi retired person that does a lot of fishing. I have tried cleaning my fish in my house in the sink. Most of the time I end up stopping up the sink. When I receive this table it was a dream come true. It’s easy to set up hook a hose to the Fossett and away you go. This table is set up like a tool for cleaning anything. Hunting are fishing. Matter of fact it was right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this table
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table. I just put it together today. I was looking for an outdoor sink for rv camping and didn't want to spend too much. It's easy to put together and store in the camper between trips. Everything works as expected. I do wish it was about an inch shorter. I am 5'5" and it comes up to just below the umbilicus. Not terribly high but will tower over my other outdoor kitchen equipment.
customer_reviews.author: cristina sola

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: This comes in very handy for gardening and even outdoor entertaining - I'm able to wash my hands and use the table to pot plants or serve drinks - the black rubber sink plug was left on the top of the sink and left a yellow ring - no matter what I use to remove the stain bleach Oxy etc. it will not come out
customer_reviews.author: Karen Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I used this for outside when I grill. Sometimes when handling meat and instead of going inside to wash my hands. I have outside access. I used a bucket to drain and throw onto the grass. Going to possibly add some pvc and extended wot the grass with gravel at the bottom. Great addition to my outside patio. Only bad is I see rust on the hinges but not a problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect gift. He's thinking about ordering another one he ...
customer_reviews.text: We needed a sink for our backyard bbq's and I wanted to present my husband with a father's day gift he could get some use out of. This was the perfect gift. He's thinking about ordering another one he likes it so much. And his brother in laws all want one for their house now! It's perfect. We love how there is a drain pipe so we can drain the water into a bucket for plants and such instead of running on the ground and soaking our feet. Another great feature is the height. It's not to high and not too low, even for taller people. The price was decent and we are happy about our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Garcia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sink to use for Cleaning Clay Supplies!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new sink table!! Great price too! I bought it specifically for rinsing and washing my hands, clay tools and containers since the sediment from clay will ruin an indoor sink. I set it just outside my ceramic studio and it has been a perfect addition. Set up was a breeze and instead of a bucket, I added a 10ft PVC extension to drain away from me - no lifting a heavy bucket. Next I will set it up more permanent with gravel patio inside a better shelter from the elements!
customer_reviews.author: Ladies G

customer_reviews.title: Great and right height too
customer_reviews.text: But newer designs include a place to hold a plastic bag for the guts/scales etc. Go for that one. This one is well made though just for the same bucks you can do better. Easy to attach to hose. Drain out through a 1.5 inch hole and you are good to go. Just that guts/offal bag thing burns me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Instructions will throw you off. Look at my pics on how to assemble drain. Sink drain hole is the right size, people are assembling it like the instructions show and that's wrong. I also use a quick disconnect for the faucet that I got at lowes. Only issues I see, is that the faucet is rusting inside after a day of using it. Might have to find a replacement at lowes. I uploaded pics in the order I assembled the drain. Hopefully it doesn't get mixed up when I hit submit. Quick disconnect is there to with part number. Nothing is leaking so far. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: adrian carlos

customer_reviews.title: Used to clean offshore fish
customer_reviews.text: We use this to clean mahi, blackfin tuna, wahoo, and multiple bottom fish. I wish we bought this when we started fishing. It is high enough so you do not have to bend over to clean the fish, the built in faucet is extremely helpful, and it is nice to be able to fold it up and put in the garage. I would not recommend it if you are cleaning a large fish like a bluefin tuna, but it has been perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  Super convenient, portable sink.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this on a big campout with multiple groups of campers. Nobody had RV's/trailers. All tent/car campers. So there were only makeshift sinks where people basically just used aquatainers or gatorate coolers. I brought this and a 12v pump. It was a huge hit and super convenient to use. I'm sure I'll also get some use out of it at home for cleaning fish catches or as a BBQ sink in the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Lars SveenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: love it but it is kinda twisted. on a flat surface the legs aren't even. over all though its pretty great. i added an extra rubber washer to hook up to stop some leaking but after adding the washer everything works perfect. if it wasn't slightly bent i'd give 5 star for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Fish....
customer_reviews.text: The size was perfect and provided a great fish cleaning station. The highlight was the table and size. Here’s the downside: faucet material is weak and broke, but easy fix. Sink drainage is a problem unless you remove the whole setup and just have a hole and use the plug so pick your poison. Other than that, I would still order it as it serves it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: I love it, i might get 2 more.
customer_reviews.text: Its like having a portable sink you can set up anywhere. Its not like that, that's exactly what it is. I store it in my greenhouse so I use it all the time. I'm thinking about getting another 1 for my airbrush set up, then possibly another 1 for moving around. I don't even hunt or fish and still I find it so frickin usefull, that I don't know why, I just didn't invent this thing years ago. I would just walk back to the house and not question it. I feel so stupid for not buying 1 sooner.
customer_reviews.author: The Hamburgler

customer_reviews.title: Best investment if you raise your own meat chickens
customer_reviews.text: This table helped me through processing 15 X-Rock chickens for the freezer. I had another folding table and was always wrestling with the hose and sprayer, dropping stuff on the ground, and in general feeling worn out at the end of the job. How wonderful to be able to place the bird in the sink and have fresh running water at the turn of the handle! Big Bonus: Extra long legs put the work up at an appropriate height so I don't get a back ache while I work.
customer_reviews.author: L. Swink

customer_reviews.title: I scored for Father’s Day!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my hubby for Father’s Day!! We LOVE it! He was so excited!!! Since we each clean our own fish, I use it more than he does. Competition is stiff around here 😂 and I love the table! The height is perfect! My hubby is 6’8” and it’s still great for him!
customer_reviews.author: Nennarie

customer_reviews.title: Great add to your sports getaway place!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, very durable and easy to assemble. I like the access it has with the water hook up and the drain tube that allows you to control the drain flow! Easy to clean and using for both fish preparation or cooking. Plus priced as a value!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Marco Knight

customer_reviews.title: Very cost effective addition for fish cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Goes together easily, the faucet and sink work well. I let it drain into a 5 gallon bucket that I dump when I'm done. I added a clamp to hold the fish. Even has a ruler embossed on the table. Folds up for winter storage.
customer_reviews.author: Rogman

customer_reviews.title: it is pricy
customer_reviews.text: i would give 4 starts if were cheaper, i feel is a rip off but it was the only alternative i thought i got for washing certain items at hand in my yard. thought the other options were lower , this is good on my back. no five starts as does not bring some locking container options, so my kids keep taking/playing with the bucket i put under.
customer_reviews.author: Mpu

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting up fish, cleans up well.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is 6'3" and he is so happy to now have something to cut up his fish on that is this height! It's wonderful! I set it up and put it together as a surprise on night after he went snagging. Spoonbill are pretty large and this worked wonderfully for him to cut it up. The hose hooks right in easily and the drain for the sink is nice and long. I'm very happy with this purchase, especially seeing how happy he is with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set up and the height is just right
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this and so did everyone at the Post Office , ha ha , , the box it was shipped in showed the merchandise. It was easy to set up and the height is just right . Love it and would recommend it as a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Missing Attachment
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time and I was very excited about it but there was a part missing. Without this attachment, the faucet cannot be attached to the table making table useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: Nice outdoor counter top for food prep
customer_reviews.text: Nice outdoor counter top for food prep, and hand washing. Easy to set up, easy to take down. Would be awesome if it came with a carrying/ storage case. I especially enjoy the height of this product. The other part I liked about the product was the ability to turn the fuacet away from the tabe to rinse stuff off. Highly recommended if you put away a lot of your own meat and produce.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: customer services
customer_reviews.text: I like customer servicers respond in the short time to solved problem , the product very quality but minus plastic parts , will not last longer , special missing parts. But overall everything work out fine, after email to customer services about missing parts ,they responded quickly ,send out the replacing parts , and voila , just little hiccup . Thumb up to customer services.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great table. It is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great table. It is very sturdy, easy to keep clean and put away. I just connect the hose, place a bucket under the drain to catch any debris and use a fish board to fillet. It got me out of the house when cleaning fish. Wife is very happy with her gift to me.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: The connection pieces fit well for no leakage. The drain has an accordion tube which you can lead to drain out far from your feet. I used this as a raw bar this past father’s day. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Discko

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. Faucet works as expected. I used this a few times while camping (I had it connected to a water pump inside a 7 gallon Aquatainer), was surprised later to find a warning sticker on one of the legs warning NOT to drink water from the faucet, which we had been. I'm not sure what the danger is, no one got sick or had any adverse effects from it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Goff

customer_reviews.title: Counter height for a 6' man
customer_reviews.text: This is the way to go! My husband put a 6 foot extension hose with a water shut off valve on the end. This makes it incredibly easy to work with. The area where the faucet attaches to the hose is close to the table underside and difficult to connect - especially a long hose. This simple solution adds another place to regulate water flow and he doesn't have to turn the water off every time he is done with it. An added bonus for me is that he is willing to go back out fishing - not worrying that he will have to clean more fish.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Bosman

customer_reviews.title: Great customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: The table is built better than I expected considering the cost and it works well. It is a bit different than the illustration though as there is no place to store the stopper. When I bought this through no fault of the manufacturer a part on the faucet broke. I contacted customer service on a Monday morning and they shipped a replacement part at no charge that day. I had the part by Thursday and used the table on Saturday.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Star

customer_reviews.title: Works great, wish the sink was deeper
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink! We have a cabin with a rain barrel that we hooked a AG water pump to for this sink to work off of, it has been a wonderful addition to our camping experience to have running water. Two reason I didn't give it 5 stars 1) the sink would be better if it was deeper and 2) the plastic table top stains very easily. But the ability to wash your hands and face in the woods make up for the shallow sink :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, it sets up and breaks down in seconds. I got it for cleaning rabbits, fish, and other small game. Took it camping last weekend and it was a huge help. The faucet does tend to spray a bit at the connection with the hose but if you're careful about tightening it down there's no issue. It is a bit smaller than I'd expected but it's by no means too small and I blame myself and my poor mental grasp of dimensions for that one lol. I even got compliments on it from my brother and sister-in-law which is great considering how toy obsessed they are!
customer_reviews.author: KSat

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy enough and you can tell it'll last for a ...
customer_reviews.text: The table was exactly what we expected. It's sturdy enough and you can tell it'll last for a while. I do have a few complaints. The instructions were terrible. The faucet was hard to put on even now it's a litle loose. To have a longer hose would be nice. I'm assuming if you buy a more expensive one it won't have these problems but we are very happy with our purchase and if you're looking for something cheaper I don't think you'll get much better!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Pittenger

customer_reviews.title: The table is great, no problem there.  The faucet though, is entirely brittle and breakable plastic
customer_reviews.text: The table is great, no problem there. The faucet though, is entirely brittle plastic. When folded up and transporting, you really have to hold your breath that nothing will bump the faucet. Ours inevitably broke, which I was expecting. I'll replace it with a halfway decent faucet, and the table will be great after that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable!
customer_reviews.text: A great gift! My dad was in love with this! I was nervous it would be crappy quality or not very sturdy but it’s exactly like the picture! Would deffinately buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Great for a picnic.
customer_reviews.text: Used this during a picnic. Was nice to wash hands during cooking. As guest show up shaking hands able to wash before handling food. Drained water into a large storage tote. Wish legs adjusted for uneven surfaces. A couple pieces of wood worked out the leveling problem. Easy assembly with diagram ofor drain and faucet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Willis

customer_reviews.title: ... a 3 day wilderness camping trip and was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a 3 day wilderness camping trip and was very happy with it. I didn't have a hose to use the sink but it still came in handy for keeping items in place and I do intend to use it for game cleaning eventually. I also used it along with my tailgate as a buffet for a church function. So far it's done everything I've asked of it and I'm very happy with it. The only thing to be aware of is that it's a little wobbly if it's not on completely flat ground but that's going to happen with any table.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Really great gift for hunter/fisher
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gift for outdoorsman/woman. Used for hunting/fishing cleaning game. My sister has one and uses it for gardening... Cleaning harvest and whatnot. Literally got three for gifts and it was definitely a hit amongst all reciepients
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hamra

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Have used table several times and I happy to have it. The sink is nice. I would recommend if you buy this table get a splitter for your hose so you can add a hose to wash the table down. The faucet is only good for the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Joey S.

customer_reviews.title: Faucet useless to clean up.
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea. E erything works great. Faucet is nice but not exactly quick release. Also can really spray to clean up. So cleaning up after getting a fish is hard. A sprayer nozzle is absolutely necessary. Otherwise it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Babsly

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's not as sturdy as I thought it would be and very lite. Can leave it out on the edge of a dock without anchoring it down pretty good. I would recommend for the casual fisherman
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this at least once a week, great quality great price highly recommended to anyone that fishes or camps.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: should have got one years ago
customer_reviews.text: This table should be a must in any fish camp. Its height is just below my belly button and I'm 6'2". This ruduces back strain big time. The drain has a flexable spout to run the water close to the ground and away from your feet. Just cleaned 25 pan fish and love the table.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and Leaking
customer_reviews.text: Have so much hope for this item before arriving and got so disappointed after saw it. The table inside arrived with damaged , though the outside package itself doesn't look much broken. I thought okay, I'll take it as long as it works. And then once I plug it, it started leaking all over my back yard. Also, the faucet was described as steel but it actually look very plastic and the inside of the barrel has rusted ... Have no idea how it got so much good reviews...
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Filthy
customer_reviews.text: Box was severely damaged and taped rips in the cardboard were covered in packing tape. When I opened it the table was absolutely filthy. There was dirt and grime all over the entire thing and some white goo on the faucet pieces. It took me over an hour to clean everything off and there's still scuff marks I won't be able to remove. I paid for a NEW table and am EXTREMELY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for a friend, as a birthday gift, who loves camping and fishing. I think this will be a great addition to his gear! It's pretty portable and can be used as a regular cleaning station (dishes, utensils, etc.) when your not fishing. Overall, I'm pretty happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: P. Levis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our summer camping trip across national parks this ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our summer camping trip across national parks this summer. Had room to cook and clean all our dishes and wash hand. Made our whole trip having a working sink and table.
customer_reviews.author: Darell

customer_reviews.title: built solid
customer_reviews.text: The table top seems well made and the legs lock in place to make for a sturdy platform. I haven't used the table yet but expect it to handle the job well. The facet looks to be on the cheap side and an included quick disconnect for a hose would have been a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: philip

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be a little better
customer_reviews.text: Would like to see a deeper sink area. Add an additional 1.5 inch depth and it would be much better
customer_reviews.author: Gent River

customer_reviews.title: flimsy. Put the faucet on, simple. But ...
customer_reviews.text: flimsy. Put the faucet on, simple. But when I stood it upright and locked the legs it was catawhamped. Wouldn't stand level. Right set of legs improperly assembled from factory. I called factory and they said return to "store" where bought.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Science

customer_reviews.title: If you cookout a lot this is a must.
customer_reviews.text: Bought so I did not have to use the bathroom sink when grilling. Works great for those high volume cookouts and also is awesome for the kids to wash their hands before they eat. Added an extension hose to the drain line so I don't turn the yard into a mud pit.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny5

customer_reviews.title: Other than drain works well
customer_reviews.text: The drain does not work at all. Does not fit in hole. But it is easy to use love the quick disconnect faucet. Holds weight well.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: VERY POORLY designed drain
customer_reviews.text: I like the table itself, however the drain is VERY poorly designed. The drain basket is too large for the table's drain whole, but after considerable filing with a rasp I was able to get it into the hole. However once that was done there is no way to mount it to the sink so I was forced to caulk it to the sink to keep it in place. Even with that all done the basket strainer still sticks above the bottom of the sink so it will always retain some water in the sink basin.
customer_reviews.author: Skinny B.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice love just what I need. It’s good for so many things I’m thinking about getting another one. And you can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: happygolucky

customer_reviews.title: Better then cleaning fish in the house.
customer_reviews.text: Got mixed up when ordering fish cleaning statiom. Thought I ordered just the table without hose, didn't realize it was a totally different table that wasn't sloped and shorter in length. However it is more solid than expected, and is taller than other brands. but that is why I picked it.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Bought new but not new.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this new but after unpacking it I noticed stains on the corners and the hardware looked used. It assembled correctly but the stain/scratches are still there. I will keep it only because I need it this weekend. It worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Inman

customer_reviews.title: The table works fine and the sink works well
customer_reviews.text: we ordered this table so that we could have a convenient place to do some quick cleaning and food prep outside when we are grilling. The table works fine and the sink works well. The problem was the assembly of the sink/faucet. Very difficult to put together. The pieces are small and the area is tight, making it hard for you to reach into assembly area. For this, I'm giving it 3 stars. Once it was finally put together, it works well and we enjoy having it out on our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Piaseczny

customer_reviews.title: The out door sink.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have, and it’s easy to setup. I set it up when I have outdoor functions, especially BBQ’s. It keeps everyone especially the kids from running in and out the house just to wash their hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too tall
customer_reviews.text: I did nit pay attention to the height so it is too tall and the faucet is not really easy to install and take off by the way I need to buy quick connection head to make it easy to connect hose and base.
customer_reviews.author: pollyweifen

customer_reviews.title: Dog wash
customer_reviews.text: For little dogs get wash station or grooming no bending over and back pain.
customer_reviews.author: texg1rl

customer_reviews.title: Good portable foldaway sink
customer_reviews.text: The table is good except the drain in sink is raised up off base and the water does not drain out
customer_reviews.author: mckenzie forestor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table. We use this table all the time
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table. We use this table all the time. We use it so much that we decided to leave it up all the time. Hand washing station, cutting watermelon, grilling out, etc. I do wish the drain hose was longer. We use a bucket to catch the water but it would be better if I could run the hose further away and just let it drain out.
customer_reviews.author: C Bennett

customer_reviews.title: The product performs as advertised and is good for outdoor use for cleaning fish
customer_reviews.text: The product performs as advertised and is good for outdoor use for cleaning fish, outdoor parties and etc. The only cons are the table stains easily and hard to get stains out of the surface of the table and the legs aren’t that steady with any type of weight on the table. It should be used with light items resting on the table. Also the drain pipe is made of the cheapest and thinnest material possible for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Syl

customer_reviews.title: super helpful, awesome table
customer_reviews.text: awesome table. i love how tall it is keeps me from leaning over so far like other short tables. the sink and faucet work amazing. i just plan on installing a clamp on the far end from the sink to hold fish better for scaling and a decent sized cutting board for the game side to not scratch up the table surface and keep things a little more sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Long

customer_reviews.title: Retraction
customer_reviews.text: There was no directions and I was assembling the drain wrong, otherwise its not a bad table
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for the price. We bought it for our lake house to clean fish down by our boat house. Perfect size and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: kcm221

customer_reviews.title: Great camping table with a sink
customer_reviews.text: Going to use this for camping for cleaning fish. For some reason if you look up camping sink this won't come up so it took some time to find something that I can set up in my horse trailer for a kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy, Your Pet Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen being remodeled.
customer_reviews.text: Bought while remodeling. Nicer than having to use bath tub!
customer_reviews.author: Psue10

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for a fisherman
customer_reviews.text: My dad loved it! It’s decently sturdy and looks nice. Such a great idea because everyone knows cleaning fish is nasty business. This saves you from having to mess up your kitchen and then deal with the fishy smell for days afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie A Franzen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Functional and nice. Needs a little assembly. Look good for the in the box instructions it saves time. Light and portable.
customer_reviews.author: WRS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered on a Sunday afternoon and it was at my door Tuesday morning! Excellent table, I was surprised with the quality considering the reasonable price. My son was very happy and he’s super picky. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kpossible67

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bakyard addition !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to have outside for cooking clean up, parties, snow cone clean up etc. We love it!!! I made a cloth skirt to go around it, to keep from seeing underneath. We use this daily! Best price of anywhere on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Bayou belle

customer_reviews.title: A back saver!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought on of these tables earlier... It will save your back while cleaning fish.
customer_reviews.author: PoppaSwag

customer_reviews.title: Great height, depth, stability, and quality.
customer_reviews.text: This table is great because it is tall enough to stand and has a great faucet. I am using it for developing prints and the basin is an amazing depth and size for washing prints or holding developing chemicals. I would definitely recommend it for photographers and game keepers alike.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron J. Burke

customer_reviews.title: This outdoor fish and game table works very well. ...
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor fish and game table works very well. We have used the table for camping and also fish cleaning. I set the table up beside our travel trailer and run a water line to it. We now have a place to wash the grand kids hands and to prep food for outside cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Bill A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table!
customer_reviews.text: I have taken it camping several times for handwashing, dishwashing, etc. Very sturdy. I would definitely recommend.... In fact, I am about to purchase a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Needed a temporary sink while our kitchen was under construction. I took advantage of this occasion to convince my wife that we needed the sink. It performed great for the summer months until the kitchen was fixed. And, it's primary function to clean the 60 lbs. of tuna I caught was very successful.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy to have this for my mom who love to ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have this for my mom who love to cooks outside. It just like a regular sinks, you can wash your hands, bowls, dishes and more.... On other hand, it is a little too high for my mom but it not a issue.... I did modify it and get ready for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - Sturdy and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best cleaning table I have seen in person when comparing price, ease of use, and storage. I installed two hooks on the garage wall and this sets right on top for great storage. Not heavy, but very sturdy(it does not rock or move at all when filleting fish). Will be using this for fish cleaning and meat trimming. Excited about using it more.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: I think this is awesome. Can take with you on RV trips.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy too. All I need are fish to clean! 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Carl Purpura

customer_reviews.title: Great buy ... works as described... no leaks just follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Works very well... very pleased ! Wish the sink part was a little Deeper
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: great product, folds out nicely
customer_reviews.text: great product, folds out nicely, sink works well. Only real gripes are that the sink basin is too shallow and the hose at the end of the sink is too short. Other than that, the unit is fairly sturdy and well made. Can process meat fairly quick on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: Camping sink replacement
customer_reviews.text: This was nearly perfect for our camping trip. The water connection seemed odd to connect, but works great now that I have done it a couple times. Would give 5-stars if the legs were adjustable height. It sits a little high.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: All purpose table
customer_reviews.text: Love the table. Not only a game table! We've set it up for patio parties, set it up by the garden and washed veggies as we pick. We are 100 percent satisfied. Lightweight and easy to store as well as move around. Great for camping too.
customer_reviews.author: mystery at midnight

customer_reviews.title: Table
customer_reviews.text: I really love this table, makes it easier to clean chickens outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perty good. price point fairly well set
customer_reviews.text: perty good . price point fairly well set. you arent getting a deal here. you are getting a 40 dollar table and an overpriced fixture. yes stainless, heavy duty, no. glad they include the lightweight plumbing. its a matter of design. works well if you need one. not a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: S.Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Handy Table, multi-use
customer_reviews.text: A nice little table to use around the yard or to take camping. It is lightweight and relatively easy to set up. Hard to get legs to lock. Got two legs fairly easy. I'm afraid to push down too hard on the other legs as I'm afraid I will pinch my skin. I didn't have my gloves handy while setting up. The faucet corner is a tight fit to get fingers in to screw on the faucet nut. Lucky I have small fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic aerator is not very good. It would be great if it was metal.
customer_reviews.text: The table is what I expected it works great. I put a leader hose with a quick disconnect on it and it made it very easy to connect to the garden hose. The only problem is the plastic faucet aerator was broken and I can not find a replacement that will fit. That is the only reason it did not get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: William E Wedin

product_meta.title: Tricam MT-2/SKFT-44 Outdoor Fish and Game Cleaning Table with Quick-Connect Stainless Steel Faucet
product_meta.description: The Tricam Outdoor Fish and Game Cleaning Table is ideal for cleaning fish and game after a long day of fishing or hunting. The table can also be used as a potting table or brought along while camping or tailgating. Constructed of durable blow-molded poly, this table features a quick-connect faucet that can be hooked to a garden hose, tapered channel for water drainage, drain hose and a convenient built in ruler located on top of the table for measuring. For quick and easy storage simply fold the legs and disconnect the faucet. This table has a 150-pound load capacity and measures 44-inches long by 23.5-inches wide by 37-inches high and weighs 27-pounds. The Tricam Outdoor Fish and Game Cleaning Table comes with a 1-year limited warranty. Tricam is a leading consumer products company who continues to lead the industry with innovative, patented designs throughout their entire product line. Tricam’s products include household step stools, lawn and garden carts, replacement tires and tire tubes.
feature_bullets: Game cleaning table is ideal for cleaning fish and game
Features a quick-connect stainless steel faucet that can be easily hooked to a garden hose and disconnected for storage
Tapered channel for water drainage, drain hose and built in ruler located on top of the table
150-pound load capacity and measures 44-inches long by 23.5-inches wide by 37-inches high and weighs 27-pounds
